#summary This page describes how to setup cl-lex.

= Supported Platforms =

cl-lex is written in standard Common Lisp and should work on any system that has [http://www.cliki.net/asdf cl-asdf] and [http://weitz.de/cl-ppcre/ cl-ppcre regex library] installed.

= Prerequisites =

Before installing cl-lex, cl-asdf and cl-ppcre must be installed.  On debian this can be done by installing the cl-asdf and cl-ppcre packages.

= Using cl-lex =

The use of cl-lex is described in the lex.lisp file.
